key.name: display-basic-properties
key.description: True if the basic properties pane is to be displayed, false otherwise.

key.name: display-extended-properties
key.description: True if the extended properties window is to be displayed, false otherwise.

key.name: display-photo-titles
key.description: True if photo titles are to be displayed beneath thumbnails in collection views, false otherwise.

key.name: display-photo-tags
key.description: True if photo tags are to be listed beneath thumbnails in collection views, false otherwise.

key.name: display-photo-ratings
key.description: True if a photo's rating should be displayed as overlaid trinket, false otherwise.

key.name: photo-rating-filter
key.description: Determines how to filter photos based on their ratings. 1: Rejected or better, 2: Unrated or better, 3: One or better, 4: Two or better, 5: Three or better, 6: Four or better, 7: Five or better.

key.name: events-sort-ascending
key.description: True if events should be sorted ascending, false if descending.

key.name: library-photos-sort-ascending
key.description: True if library photos should be sorted ascending, false if descending.

key.name: library-photos-sort-by
key.description: A numeric code that specifies the sort criteria for photos in library views.

key.name: event-photos-sort-ascending
key.description: True if event photos should be sorted ascending, false if descending.

key.name: event-photos-sort-by
key.description: Specifies the sort criteria for event photos.

key.name: use-24-hour-time
key.description: True if should display times with a 24 hour clock, false if times should use AM/PM notation.

key.name: keep-relativity
key.description: True if when adjusting time/date of photos, relative time should be maintained. False if all photos should be set to the same time.

key.name: modify-originals
key.description: True if when adjusting time/date of photos, the original files should be modified as well. False if changes are made only in the database.

key.name: show-welcome-dialog
key.description: True if, when on startup, a welcome dialog should be shown. False if it should not be shown.

key.name: sidebar-position
key.description: The width, in pixels, of the sidebar

key.name: photo-thumbnail-scale
key.description: The scale of photo thumbnails, ranging from 72 to 360.

key.name: background-color
key.description: A grayscale color for use as the background color.

key.name: hide-photos-already-imported
key.description: Last used selection state of the "hide photos already imported" option in the import page.

key.name: delay
key.description: Delay (in seconds) between photos in the slideshow.

key.name: transition-delay
key.description: The time (in seconds) that a transition runs between photos in a slideshow

key.name: transition-effect-id
key.description: The name of the transition effect that will be used between photos when running a slideshow

key.name: library-maximize
key.description: True if library application is maximized, false otherwise.

key.name: library-width
key.description: The last recorded width of the library application window.

key.name: library-height
key.description: The last recorded height of the library application window.

key.name: direct-maximize
key.description: True if direct-edit application is maximized, false otherwise.

key.name: direct-width
key.description: The last recorded width of the direct-edit application window.

key.name: direct-height
key.description: The last recorded height of the direct-edit application window.

key.name: sidebar-position
key.description: The last recorded position of the divider between the sidebar and view in library application window.

key.name: import-dir
key.description: Directory in which imported photo files are placed.

key.name: auto-import
key.summary: watch library directory for new files
key.description: If true, files added to the library directory are automatically imported.

key.name: commit-metadata
key.description: If true, changes to metadata (tags, titles, etc.) are written to the master photo file.

key.name: use-lowercase-filenames
key.description: If true, Shotwell will convert all filenames to lowercase when importing photo files

key.name: directory-pattern
key.description: A string encoding a naming pattern that will be used to name photo directories on import.

key.name: directory-pattern-custom
key.description: A string encoding a custom naming pattern that will be used to name photo directories on import.

key.name: raw-developer-default
key.description: Default option for which RAW developer Shotwell will use.

key.name: external-photo-editor
key.description: External application used to edit photos.

key.name: external-raw-editor
key.description: External application used to edit RAW photos.

key.name: last-used-service
key.description: A numeric code representing the last service to which photos were published

key.name: default-service
key.description: A numeric code representing the last service to which photos were published

key.name: session-key
key.description: Facebook API session key for the currently logged in session, if any

key.name: session-secret
key.description: Facebook API session secret for the currently logged in session, if any

key.name: uid
key.description: Facebook user i.d. for the currently logged in user, if any

key.name: user-name
key.description: The name of the currently logged in Facebook user, if any

key.name: default-size
key.description: A numeric code representing the default size for photos published to Facebook

key.name: auth-token
key.description: The authorization token for the currently logged in Flickr user, if any

key.name: username
key.description: The user name of the currently logged in Flickr user, if any

key.name: default-size
key.description: A numeric code representing the default size for photos published to Flickr

key.name: visibility
key.description: A numeric code representing the default visibility for photos published to Flickr

key.name: auth-token
key.description: The authorization token for the currently logged in Picasa Web Albums user, if any

key.name: user-name
key.description: The user name of the currently logged in Picasa Web Albums user, if any

key.name: default-size
key.description: A numeric code representing the default size for photos uploaded to Picasa Web Albums

key.name: last-album
key.description: The name of the last album the user published photos to, if any

key.name: user-name
key.description: YouTube username for the currently logged in session, if any

key.name: auth-token
key.description: YouTube authentication token for the currently logged in session, if any

key.name: interpreter-state-cookie
key.description: A numeric code that captures the state of the GStreamer plug-in environment

key.name: content-layout
key.description: A numeric code that describes how photos are laid out on the page during printing

key.name: content-ppi
key.description: The number of pixels per inch (ppi) sent to the printer during printing

key.name: content-width
key.description: The width of the printed emulsion on the page when printing

key.name: content-height
key.description: The height of the printed emulsion on the page when printing

key.name: content-units
key.description: A numeric code representing unit of measure (inches or centimeters) used when printing

key.name: images-per-page
key.description: A numeric code representing the currently selected images per page mode used when printing

key.name: size-selection
key.description: The index of the current print size in a pre-defined list of standard sizes

key.name: match-aspect-ratio
key.description: Determines whether custom print sizes must match the aspect ratio of the original photo

key.name: print-titles
key.description: True if the title of a photo should be printed when the photo is printed, false otherwise.

key.name: titles-font
key.description: The name of the font to use for photo titles when they are printed.
